snippet.title: DeHexTD Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming Soon, Wishlist/Follow now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1674160/DeHexTD

DeHexTD is a minimalistic Tower Defense Game - defend against the creeps as long as you can - when they reach the middle they will send of a blast and make a field unusable.

The playfild will grow every level, creeps will get stronger every level. How long can you survive?
